photoeffects: Adjustment of contrast sharpness, saturation, red, green, blue and skin tone are available
continuousshooting: Under conditions where the flash does not fire automatically
exposurecontrolmethod: Manual Exposure, Program Shift, Safety Shift, AE Lock
whitebalancecontrol: Auto*, Daylight, Cloudy, Tungsten, Fluorescent, Fluorescent H, Flash, Custom 1, Custom 2
storagemedia: SD Memory Card, SDHC Memory Card, SDXC Memory Card
lcdmonitor: 2.8-inch TFT Color Vari-angle LCD with wide viewing angle
shootingmodes: Shooting movies is possible with the movie button
builtinflash: Auto, Flash On, Slow Synchro, Flash Off
fileformat: Design rule for camera file system, DPOF Version 1.1 compliant
